product_name: Teva Mush Mandalyn Wedge Ola 2 Sandals - Women's
long_description: The Teva Mush Mandalyn Wedge Ola 2 sandals are quintessential footwear for warm-weather fun and frolicking. 1.5 in. wedge heels take you from beach to dinner in comfort and style. Polyester crisscross webbing straps gently wrap insteps for a secure fit. Contoured, lightweight EVA topsoles and midsoles supply plush cushioning with enhanced arch support. Molded EVA outsoles on the Teva Mush Mandalyn Wedge Ola 2 sandals deliver positive traction on all types of surfaces. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: The Teva Mush Mandalyn Wedge Ola 2 sandals are quintessential footwear for warm-weather fun and frolicking.
